# GENERATED BY: test/deps/executables_test.dart

## Section 0
$ tree
|-- myapp
|   |-- bin
|   |   |-- foo.dart (9 B)
|   |   |-- sub
|   |   |   '-- bar.dart (9 B)
|   |   '-- sub (4 KB)
|   |-- bin (4 KB)
|   |-- pubspec.lock (114 B)
|   '-- pubspec.yaml (55 B)
'-- myapp (4 KB)

-------------------------------- END OF OUTPUT ---------------------------------

## Section 1
$ pub deps --executables
myapp:foo

-------------------------------- END OF OUTPUT ---------------------------------

## Section 2
$ pub deps --executables --dev
myapp:foo

-------------------------------- END OF OUTPUT ---------------------------------

## Section 3
$ pub deps --json
{
  "root": "myapp",
  "packages": [
    {
      "name": "myapp",
      "version": "0.0.0",
      "kind": "root",
      "source": "root",
      "dependencies": []
    }
  ],
  "sdks": [
    {
      "name": "Dart",
      "version": "0.1.2+3"
    }
  ],
  "executables": [
    ":foo"
  ]
}
